data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in South Carolina, United States that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of South Carolina, United States
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of South Carolina, United States. Please, stir the 1,361,979 believers here to pray for awakening.
Spirit, help the church in the state of South Carolina do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of South Carolina, United States. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Arab, Omani people.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of South Carolina, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of South Carolina.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in South Carolina, United States.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
